name: Sweet World Jelly Boom
description:
New innovative jelly game comes!
Objectives differ in over 100 levels. Make matches of 3 or more jelly, create candy blasts! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging.
Sweet World Jelly Boom features:
• Sweet and shining jellies!
• Over 100 interesting levels
• Multiple game goals, time mode, move mode, and more
• Very small size but tasty graphics
